title: Goldman’s Rosy Stock Market Bottom Call Is Ridiculously Foolish
description: Goldman Sachs predicts the stock market won’t crash to new lows. But Morgan Stanley offers a much more realistic recovery timeline. The post Goldman’s Rosy Stock Market Bottom Call Is Ridiculously Foolish appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Goldman Sachs predicts that the S&P 500 wont register new lows.
  • The investment banks forecast is based on the assumption that there wont be a new wave of infections after the economy reopens.
